pageContext.claim: “We certainly don't want to stifle free speech, but that's no longer free speech. See, I don't think that the mainstream media is free speech either because it's so crooked. It's so dishonest. So to me, free speech is not when you see something good and then you purposely write bad.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump gets the First Amendment completely wrong. The founders included it in the Bill of Rights because they wanted a government checked by the people through the press, not the other way around as Trump seems to think.
